document_data.name: Nelinarian, Tansmith
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarlisha Kjenth''' was a [[truenamer]]. She led one of the study groups in the [[House of the Unnamed]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Besides her maturing [[truenamer]] skills, she had trained as a [[sorcerer]].
document_data.Activities: As of {{yearlink|1373}}, she led a study group on [[truespeak]].
document_data.Relationships: She was one of the study group leaders in the [[House of the Unnamed]].
